content.raw:
Not 100% sure but this case looks OK to me. The world queues the model removal request and when is time, it processes the request. As part of the model destruction, some events might be triggered (which result in work to do in other threads, such as the sensor thread). 

We could use the model destructor for sending the deletion message confirmation and the constructor or Load() for confirming the creation of the model.
